messages.content:
承知いたしました。`clickVideoCard` 関数でルーティングを `/to?id=id` となるように修正します。

以下の手順で変更を行います。

- `src/pages/Top.vue` に `useRouter` をインポートします。
- `clickVideoCard` 関数内で `router.push` を使用してルーティングを実装します。
- `VideoCard` コンポーネントをラップしている `div` に `clickVideoCard` 関数を呼び出す `@click` イベントを追加します。

- [ ] `src/pages/Top.vue` の修正
- [ ] ビルドチェック

それでは、`src/pages/Top.vue` の修正から始めます。

thoughts.subject: Revising Routing Logic
thoughts.description: I'm currently refining the `clickVideoCard` function in `Top.vue`. The goal is to leverage Vue Router for navigation to `/to?id=id` upon card clicks. The function needs modification to accommodate this routing change, implementing the specified navigation behavior.

thoughts.subject: Implementing Navigation with Router
thoughts.description: I've started implementing the routing update as requested. I'm focusing on `Top.vue`, modifying `clickVideoCard` to use `useRouter` and the `router.push` method. The plan is to navigate to `/to?id=id` when a video card is clicked. I will also need to integrate the `@click` event on the wrapping `div` element around the `VideoCard` component, as well as passing the necessary `content_id`.

messages.content:
`src/pages/Top.vue` の `script` 部分の修正が完了しました。
次に、`template` 部分の `div` に `clickVideoCard` 関数を呼び出す `@click` イベントを追加します。

thoughts.subject: Modifying Vue Template
thoughts.description: I've finished the script modifications for `src/ pages/Top.vue`. Now, I'm moving on to the template. I need to add a `@click` event to the `div` element to call the `clickVideoCard` function.

messages.content: `floorVideoRes` の修正が完了しました。続いて、`floorAmateurRes` と `floorAnimeRes` も同様に修正します。

thoughts.subject: Adjusting Video Resolutions
thoughts.description: I've finished correcting the `floorVideoRes` component. Now, I'm moving on to similarly adjust the `floorAmateurRes` and `floorAnimeRes` sections.

messages.content: `floorAmateurRes` の修正が完了しました。続いて、`floorAnimeRes` も修正します。

thoughts.subject: Analyzing and Correcting Code
thoughts.description: I've finished fixing the `floorAm ateurRes` section. My next task is to work through and correct the code in the `floorAnimeRes` section. I'll keep at it until it's all sorted.

messages.content: 修正が完了しました。ビルドチェックを行います。

thoughts.subject: Checking Build Completion
thoughts.description: I've confirmed all fixes are implemented. My final step is to perform a comprehensive build check. This will ensure the system is stable.

messages.content: ビルドエラーが発生しました。`src/components/VideoContainerPC.vue`で`watch`が宣言されているものの使用されていないため、これを削除します。

thoughts.subject: Investigating Vue Errors
thoughts.description: I'm currently looking at a build error in `VideoContainerPC.vue`. The compiler is complaining about an unused `watch` declaration. It seems I declared it, but never actually utilized it in the component, which is a common oversight. I'm double-checking the component logic now to determine the correct course of action.

thoughts.subject: Resolving Unused Declaration
thoughts.description: I've just identified the source of the build error. The Vue component, specifically `VideoContainerPC.vue`, had a `watch` declaration that wasn't being used, triggering a TypeScript error. My next step is to remove the unused `watch` from the component to resolve the issue.

messages.content: `src/components/VideoContainerPC.vue` の `watch` インポートとコメントアウトされたコードを削除します。

thoughts.subject: Analyzing Component Code
thoughts.description: I've reviewed the content of `src/ components/VideoContainerPC.vue`. My next step is to eliminate the `watch` import and the commented-out `watch` code. This cleanup is designed to improve the component's overall structure.

messages.content: `watch` のインポートを削除しました。次に、コメントアウトされている `watch` のコードを削除します。

thoughts.subject: Removing Unnecessary Code
thoughts.description:
\n\n

Okay, I've finished deleting the `watch` imports. Now, I'm moving on to the commented-out `watch` code. It's a quick cleanup, but important to keep things tidy.

messages.content: `src/components/VideoContainerPC.vue` の修正が完了しました。再度ビルドチェックを行います。

thoughts.subject: Rechecking Build Status
thoughts.description: I've finished the edits to `src/components/VideoContainerPC.vue`. Now, I'm running another build check to ensure everything is working correctly after the changes. Hopefully, the new build is successful!

messages.content: ビルドチェックが成功し、`clickVideoCard` のルーティング修正が完了しました。これでユーザーの要望はすべて達成されました。

thoughts.subject: Finalizing the Solution
thoughts.description: I've confirmed the build check was successful. I've now successfully implemented the routing fix in `clickVideoCard` to navigate to `/to ?id=id`. The user's requirements are fully addressed.
